Player History

Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 3/2/2002 to a minor league deal...
Released by Arizona on 8/31/2003...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2004 to a minor league contract.
Released by San Francisco on 8/16/2005...
Drafted in 4th round, 94th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2009...
Injured on 6/3/2013 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Baltimore to San Diego on 6/15/2013 (Going to SDN: C C. Mira, CF T. Hunter. Going to BAL: 1B M. Skole, LF D. Cozens)...
Had first career hit on 6/8/2014, off Jake Peavy (ARI)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/2014, off Johan Santana (CHN)...
Traded from San Diego to Colorado on 2/27/2016 (Going to COL: C C. Mira. Going to SDN: P P. Clemens, P E. Butler, SS J. Jones)...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/29/2016...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Arizona on 4/11/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/2018, hitting .600 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Traded from Colorado to New York (N) on 2/25/2019 (Going to NYM: C C. Mira. Going to COL: P J. Tazawa, C J. Saltalamacchia)...
Drafted in 7th round, 129th overall pick, by Detroit in 1977...
Injured on 7/20/1978 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
